org.amcgala.framework.camera

Class AbstractCamera

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.amcgala.framework.camera.AbstractCamera
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Camera
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OrthographicCamera, PerspectiveCamera, SimplePerspectiveCamera

    public abstract class AbstractCamera
extends Object
implements Camera
    Eine abstrakte Implementierung des Camera Interface.
    Author:
    Robert Giacinto
